summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 32nd Avenue South from Orcas Street to Graham Street; by grading and graveling the same; providing for the necessary surface drainage; all in accordance with Resolution No. 16399 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
